text_block_list.text: Hahaha, you've gotta be kidding me…
Hahaha, you've gotta be kidding me…

I'm her trainer, but even I have no idea what she's really capable of. I 
can barely hide how excited that makes me.

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Next is one-furlong sprints. Racers, you've all practiced for this. 
Parents, guardians, friends and family—make sure to cheer for these 
kids like crazy.

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Wow, amazing! Narita Brian jumped ahead! She's Biwa Hayahide's 
sister, all right.

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Brian wins first place!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text:
She's pretty fast out there, just like her big sister! Give her a round of 
applause, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Adult A
text_block_list.text: She'll make big waves if she ever gets into the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Adult B
text_block_list.text: She might even be faster than her sister.

text_block_list.name: Young Hayahide
text_block_list.text: (Brian…)

Narita Brian proved she has more than what it takes to win the 
Japanese Derby.

Her sprint at the end is all anyone can talk about, and there have 
been nonstop requests for interviews.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The media's clamoring outside the doors again. Ms. Tazuna was 
practically in tears, begging Brian to talk to them.
Sure, but the number of requests is enough to interfere with training.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Guess I'll have to save the day. No worries, I'll answer all their 
questions as Brian's spokesperson!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: That doesn't bother me, so long as I get to run.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Great, that settles it! Fact or fiction, I'll talk about it all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: How about we stick to fact!
Well, I don't think they'll agree to it, but I guess it's worth a shot.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm heading out to train. Thanks for handling the mess.

Oh, if you're going now, you'd better train outside the school 
grounds. The academy's teeming with reporters.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Okay, thanks.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She really only ever has racing on her mind. However many races she 
conquers, it never seems to be enough.

Her focus is what drives her ability. I'm sure it'll continue to drive her 
past what we can imagine.

Her focus is what drives her ability. I'm sure it'll continue to drive her 
past what we can imagine.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But just what is the source of all that focus?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff… Puff…

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Wait! Hey, waaait!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl's Sister
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff… I did it! I win!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Puff… Oooh, why didn't you wait?!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl's Sister
text_block_list.text: 'Cause it's a race, silly!

text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Waaagh! Waaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What's this? You're training outside too?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sis…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
So the reporters have been hounding you. It's no surprise with you on 
the brink of becoming a Triple Crown champion.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And… do you think you can win the Kikuka Sho?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Beats me—haven't given it any thought.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't mean to say it's meaningless or anything, but the Triple 
Crown's not my goal.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's not about whether I can win the Kikuka Sho. I will win it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: A perfectly fitting answer for you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You've always been called a heap of talent, and now you're living up 
to that name. I'm very proud to have such an impressive sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Even so, I haven't beaten you yet.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't give a damn about talent or being amazing. Those are just 
words.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: All I crave is to get ahead of you when we race in the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm honored to be the object of your desire, but I'm afraid I can't 
grant your wish so easily.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I understand that much after chasing you all this time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I should get back to training. Later, Big Sis.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Take care of yourself.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's difficult having a sister brimming with skill. Continuing to stay in 
front of you is a Herculean task.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I also have a big sister's pride. I can't lose to you, Triple Crown 
champion or not.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: GOOO! HAYAHIDEEE!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide glides to the front with ease on the final turn! The 
favorite, Biwa Hayahide, is in the lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Her pace isn't letting up even in the stretch! The rest of the pack is 
speeding up, but Hayahide's lead is only growing!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Look at that power! Biwa Hayahide claims victory in the Takarazuka 
Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Just like her sister, Narita Brian, she wins it with a landslide five-length lead! AND in record time!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Wowie! Hayahide's incredible!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaagh! Congrats, Hayahideee!
She really is your sibling.
She really is your sibling.
